name: BetterPause
description: A mod inspired by the collar server, an improvement for the geometry dash pause menu.

issues.info: Report any issues you have on GitHub issues.

type-pause.name: Select Pause
type-pause.description:
Choose the type of pause style you want: 
1. BetterPause 
2. ClassicPause 
3. SimplePause 
0. DisablePause (You could just disable the mod, but just in case).

level-editor-hack.name: Level Editor Hack
level-editor-hack.description: I couldn't adapt the level edit recognition of the mods menus, sorry :(

show-comment-button.name: Show Comment button
show-comment-button.description: Displays the level comments button, in general, in the level information and comments button.

amount-scroll-button.name: Scroll Amount Button
amount-scroll-button.description: How much space the button list moves up and down with the up and down buttons.

disable-arrow-buttons.name: Disable Arrow Buttons
disable-arrow-buttons.description: Disable Button List Arrow. (This will make the list look choppy, and also mods like Pause Zoom Menu that disable scrolling make it difficult to move the button list.)

tolerance-in-buttons-list.name: Tolerance in Buttons List
tolerance-in-buttons-list.description: Being able to turn off buttons while scrolling through a list, with a set distance from the scroll button.
